content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the court ordered the defendant to take ownership of a car a mazda 6 and a trailer the applicant was ordered to pay the defendant compensation for a greater share of the property possession the legal text discusses various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property the defendant did not appear at the hearing and the applicant is requesting the dissolution of the marriage the court will consider the evidence and make a decision on the requested actions the court has granted the action and dissolved the marriage the defendant has been ordered to take ownership of certain vehicles and the applicant has been ordered to pay compensation the defendant has also been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings
